Package edu.ifmo.tikunov.lab4.console

Class Command

java.lang.Object
edu.ifmo.tikunov.lab4.console.Command
public abstract class Command extends Object
Instance of this class represents an executable command. Should be instantiated within command executor as an anonymous class

    • executeIfValid

      public void executeIfValid​(String params) throws BadParametersException, ExitSignal
      Tests string against command parameter list, parses parameters and then executes the command.
      Parameters:
      params - string with command parameters
      Throws:
      BadParametersException - if params doesn't match parameter list
      ExitSignal - if command sends exit signal
